resources.string: Players score is used to define your rank against others players worldwide and players from your country, the rank is based on your highest score. Country score is defined by addition of all players scores (every play score not only the hight score) in the same country and it will be used to define country ranks
To earn points players have to answer math operations correct on Time.\n - (For Level 1: 1 pt, Level 2: 2 pts .... Level 10 and above: 10 pts) for each correct answers

- Level 1: operations for 2 digits numbers, time 20 seconds.
 - Level 2: operations and substractions for 2 digits numbers, time 20 seconnds 

 - Level 3: operations and substractions for 3 digit numbers(till number 300), Multiplications for 2 digits (till number 20), time 20 seconds. 

 - Level 4: operations and substractions for 3 digit numbers(till number 450), Multiplications for 2 digits(till nnumber 50), time 20 seconds. 

 - Level 5: operations and substractions for 3 digit numbers(till number 550), Multiplications for 2 digits(till nnumber 50),Division till number 20, time 15 seconds. 

 - Level 6: operations and substractions for 3 digit numbers(till number 650), Multiplications for 2 digits(till nnumber 50),Division till number 20, time 15 seconds. 

 - Level 7: operations and substractions for 3 digit numbers(till number 750), Multiplications for 2 digits(till nnumber 55),Division till number 30, time 15 seconds. 

 - Level 8: operations and substractions for 3 digit numbers(till number 850), Multiplications for 2 digits(till nnumber 55),Division till number 50, time 15 seconds. 

 - Level 9: operations and substractions for 4 digit numbers(till number 1000), Multiplications for 2 digits(till nnumber 60),Division till number 100, time 15 seconds. 

 - Level 10 and above: operations and substractions for 4 digit numbers(till number 2000), Multiplications for 2 digits(till nnumber 100),Division till number 150, time 15 seconds.
Diamonds are used to stop the timer, you can bought them from store. \n player got one free diamonnd on signup, and each month hero will get one free diamond

- Score > 60: +5 on your hight score 
 - Score > 120: +10 on your hight score 
 - Score > 460: 1 free diamond
 - Score > 600: 5 free diamonds
